abilities.name: We Are Friends
abilities.description: We Are FriendsAbilityBUFF Kupa recovers 10% Max HP per second after not taking damage for 5s. When Kupa is killed, Popol can pray for 3s to bring it back to the battlefield. Cooldown: 45s. After every 3 consecutive attacks, Kupa enhances Popol's next attack, allowing him to deal (+220%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. Kupa has 2500(+1200%Total Physical Attack) Max HP and inherits 100% of Popol's other attributes and passive equipment effects. Popol and Kupa always fight alongside each other.

abilities.name: Bite 'em, Kupa!
abilities.description: Wolf Form Alpha Wolf Form Bite 'em, Kupa!AbilityDamage CCTypePhysical Skill Popol throws a spear at the target enemy, dealing them 80(+100%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, and orders Kupa to lunge at the enemy, dealing them 100(+75%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and locking onto them for 3s. Alpha Wolf Form: Kupa stuns the enemy for 1s and bites them 3 times in quick succession. 6.550 Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Cooldown 6.5 6.5 6.5 6.5 Skill Cost 50 60 70 80 Signal Arrow Damage 80 110 140 170 Base Damage 100 130 160 190 Bite 'em, Kupa!AbilityDamage CCTypePhysical Skill Popol throws a spear at the target enemy, dealing them 80(+100%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, and orders Kupa to lunge at the enemy, dealing them 100(+75%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and locking onto them for 3s. abilities.name: Kupa, Help!
abilities.description: Wolf Form Alpha Wolf Form Kupa, Help!AbilityCC AoETypePhysical Skill Popol summons Kupa back, gaining a 240(+200%Extra Physical Attack) shield while dealing 240(+50%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 35% for 0.5s. Kupa will then assist Popol to attack nearby enemies for 3s. Alpha Wolf Form: Kupa darts back to Popol, knocking nearby enemies airborne for 0.2s. The shield and damage are increased to 125%. 6.580 Level 1 Level 2 Level 3 Level 4 Cooldown 6.5 6.5 6.5 6.5 Skill Cost 80 90 100 110 Base Shield 240 270 300 330 Base Damage 240 270 300 330 Kupa, Help!AbilityCC AoETypePhysical Skill Popol summons Kupa back, gaining a 240(+200%Extra Physical Attack) shield while dealing 240(+50%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 35% for 0.5s. abilities.name: We Are Angry!
abilities.description: We Are Angry!AbilityBUFF Popol and Kupa enter the Enraged state for 12s, gaining 15% extra Movement Speed and increasing, their Attack Speed to 1.3 times. Kupa turns into Alpha Wolf Form, gaining 1500 extra Max HP, fully restoring its HP, while enhancing its other skills. 38.0100
